Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the appointment of members of the Battery Park city authority
Summary: Relates to the appointment of members of the Battery Park city authority; provides that a majority of the members shall be residents of Battery park city and any vacancy shall be filled within sixty days of such vacancy.
LawCode: Amd ยง1973, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the appointment of members of the Battery Park city authority
